      • generate

        public java.lang.String generate(long topN,
                                 long curTime,
                                 boolean filter,
                                 boolean norm,
                                 boolean sitemap)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Mark URLs ready for fetching.
        Parameters:
        topN - top threshold for maximum number of URLs permitted in a batch
        curTime - the current time in milliseconds
        filter - optional filtering of URLs within the generated batch
        norm - optional normalization of URls within the generated batch
        sitemap - flag indicating whether a URL is a sitemap and hence processed accordingly
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
